name: Lone Star Citrus Growers
notes: Last independent, family-owned and operated Texas citrus packing house. Established in 2007.

name: South Tex Organics, LC
notes: Largest organic citrus and vegetable grower in Texas. Over 500 certified organic acres. USDA certified organic.

name: Triple J Organics, LLC
notes: USDA Certified Organic. Founded in 1995. 83 acres. Family and minority-owned business.

name: Wonderful Citrus
notes: Largest fresh citrus grower in western United States. Processing and juicing facility in Mission.

name: Growers Select Produce Inc
notes: Founded in 1987. Year-round watermelon operation. Grows, packs, and ships seedless watermelon 52 weeks a year. All farms and facilities are third-party certified.

name: Rio Fresh
notes: Third-generation, family-owned business. Farming for over 75 years. Over 30 varieties of fresh Texas greens, herbs, and onions. State-of-the-art packing facility.

name: Thompson Farms
